comments.author: Team_MegaPari
comments.body: Hey Guys!Take part in our brand new promotion:-No personal data needed;-Profitable slot to play;-BTC Reward for the luckiest bitcointalk user!

comments.author: Team_MegaPari
comments.body: Hi All! Make sure to play the right slot - the game is called "Crash" and you can reach it by clicking on the first picture on "PLAY NOW" button.¬† Good luck!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Team_MegaPari on July 27, 2023, 09:28:54 AMHi All! Make sure to play the right slot - the game is called "Crash" and you can reach it by clicking on the first picture on "PLAY NOW" button.¬† Good luck! I played a bit but completely forgot to take a screenshot during the game. I can only set bet history. Is that acceptable or must there be both screenshots* (during the game and history)?Recording the screen and creating a screenshot from there is complicated and a bit tiring.It would be good if each bet had its own ID, which you could check. This game also lacks an all-bet history, at least the latest 10 games.

Is that acceptable or must there be both screenshots* (during the game and history)?Recording the screen and creating a screenshot from there is complicated and a bit tiring.It would be good if each bet had its own ID, which you could check. This game also lacks an all-bet history, at least the latest 10 games.Hey. We will need a screenshot of your multiplier and your account ID. My team will be able to check your bets in the system. @Royse I also think recording the screen is a bit complicated, the screenshots with the outcomes should be enough. What do you think?
